events.name: Decarbonizing Transport Sector
events.wd_description: The global commitment to decarbonizing the transport sector has resulted in an unabated growth in the markets for electric vehicles and their batteries.
events.description: The global commitment to decarbonizing the transport sector has resulted in an unabated growth in the markets for electric vehicles and their batteries.

events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The demand for battery raw materials is continuously growing to meet the net-zero emissions targets.
events.description: The demand for battery raw materials is continuously growing to meet the net-zero emissions targets.

events.name: Lithium Demand
events.wd_description: The electric vehicle market demand for lithium will increase 26-times between 2021 and 2050.
events.description: The electric vehicle market demand for lithium will increase 26-times between 2021 and 2050.

events.name: Challenges in meeting demand
events.wd_description: Diverse challenges in meeting the growing demand for battery minerals include sustainable supply uncertainties, environmental, social, and governance complexities, and geopolitical tensions.
events.description: Diverse challenges in meeting the growing demand for battery minerals include sustainable supply uncertainties, environmental, social, and governance complexities, and geopolitical tensions.

events.name: Sustainable supply uncertainties
events.wd_description: Uncertainties in sustainably supplying the necessary battery minerals to meet future demand.
events.description: Uncertainties in sustainably supplying the necessary battery minerals to meet future demand.

events.name: Environmental complexities
events.wd_description: Environmental challenges associated with extracting and processing battery minerals.
events.description: Environmental challenges associated with extracting and processing battery minerals.

events.name: Social and governance complexities
events.wd_description: Social and governance issues related to mining and processing battery minerals, including labor practices and community impacts.
events.description: Social and governance issues related to mining and processing battery minerals, including labor practices and community impacts.

events.name: Geopolitical tensions
events.wd_description: Geopolitical issues affecting the stability and reliability of the battery mineral supply chain.
events.description: Geopolitical issues affecting the stability and reliability of the battery mineral supply chain.
